message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1000000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I am willing to consider a price closer to my budget. My counteroffer for the product is $950000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle. However, I still need to make a profit on this deal, so I'm willing to compromise further. My revised counteroffer is $1050000, but I'm willing to meet you at $1020000 if that's the best you can do.
I understand your position, Alice. Let's try to find a common ground. My counteroffer for the product is $1000000.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence. However, I'm still not willing to go below $1080000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our last two offers, so my revised counteroffer is $1040000. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a fair deal, Alice. My counteroffer for the product is $1030000.

Bob, I appreciate your continued interest in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. My revised counteroffer is $1090000, but I'm willing to meet you at $1060000 if that's the best you can do. This is my last offer before considering other options.
I've considered your latest offer, Alice. My counteroffer for the product is $1050000.

Bob, I've made one last attempt to meet you in the middle. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1100000, which is the highest price I'm willing to accept. If you're still interested, I'm willing to accept this offer. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
Alice, I appreciate your efforts. My final counteroffer for the product is $1080000.
